TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Financial extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用來執行帳務處理運算的程序。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform financial operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援 Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫成員來執行例如折舊、 目前和未來的值、 利率、 率傳回時和付款的財務計算。This module supports the Visual Basic run-time library members that perform financial calculations such as depreciation, present and future values, interest rates, rates of return, and payments. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rate`函數來計算貸款利率付款的總數目 (`TotPmts`)，loan 付款數量 (`Payment`)，目前的值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，未來值的貸款 (`FVal`)、 數字，指出是否為開頭或結尾付款期到期付款 (`PayType`)，和預期的利率的近似值 (`Guess`)。This example uses the `Rate` function to calculate the interest rate of a loan, given the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of the loan payment (`Payment`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`), and an approximation of the expected interest rate (`Guess`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double DDB (double Cost, double Salvage, double Life, double Period, double Factor = 2);
.method public static float64 DDB(float64 Cost, float64 Salvage, float64 Life, float64 Period, float64 Factor) cil managed
Public Function DDB (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double, Period As Double, Optional Factor As Double = 2) As Double
static member DDB : double * double * double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的初始成本。

span.span: specifying initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產在可用期末的價值。

span.span: specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的可用期間長度。

span.span: specifying length of useful life of the asset.

param.name: Period
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定計算資產折舊所用的期間。

span.span: specifying period for which asset depreciation is calculated.

param.name: Factor
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定餘額遞減所用的利率。

span.span: specifying rate at which the balance declines.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設是 2 (雙倍遞減法)。

span.span: If omitted, 2 (double-declining method) is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定在使用雙倍餘額遞減法或您指定的某個其他方法時，資產在特定期間內的折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定在使用雙倍餘額遞減法或您指定的某個其他方法時，資產在特定期間內的折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the depreciation of an asset for a specific time period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 餘額倍率遞減法計算折舊以加速速率。The double-declining balance method computes depreciation at an accelerated rate. 折舊的第一個週期中最高，而且在連續期間會降低。Depreciation is highest in the first period and decreases in successive periods. `Life`和`Period`引數必須以相同的單位表示。The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Life`指定月數`Period`也必須指定以月為單位。For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months. 所有引數必須是正數。All arguments must be positive numbers. `DDB`函式會使用下列公式來計算給定的期間內的折舊：The `DDB` function uses the following formula to calculate depreciation for a given period: 折舊 / 週期 = ((Cost – Salvage) \* 因數) / 生命週期Depreciation / Period = ((Cost – Salvage) \* Factor) / Life ## Examples 這個範例會使用`DDB`函數來傳回計算資產折舊的初始成本在指定期間內 (`InitCost`)，結尾的資產使用年限的殘值 (`SalvageVal`)、 總年數 (資產的生命週期`LifeTime`)，計算的折舊的年度之期間 (`Depr`)。This example uses the `DDB` function to return the depreciation of an asset for a specified period given the initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`), and the period in years for which the depreciation is calculated (`Depr`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double FV (double Rate, double NPer, double Pmt, double PV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 FV(float64 Rate, float64 NPer, float64 Pmt, float64 PV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function FV (Rate As Double, NPer As Double, Pmt As Double, Optional PV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member FV : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每期利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定年金的總付款期數。

span.span: specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifying payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 選擇項。，指定一系列未來付款的現值 (或整筆金額)。

span.span: specifying present value (or lump sum) of a series of future payments.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 。

span.span: If omitted, is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金未來值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金未來值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the future value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示付款期計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也使用來計算月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 所有引數，若是現金支出 （例如存款） 會以負號;現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FV`函數來傳回給定百分比投資的未來值比率，每個期間導致視覺效果 (`APR / 12`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，付款 (`Payment`)，目前的值投資 (`PVal`)，並指出是否付款的開頭或結尾付款期的數字 (`PayType`)。This example uses the `FV` function to return the future value of an investment given the percentage rate that accrues per period (`APR / 12`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the payment (`Payment`), the current value of the investment (`PVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is made at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). 請注意，因為`Payment`代表現金支出，它是負數。Note that because `Payment` represents cash paid out, it is a negative number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#22)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double IPmt (double Rate, double Per, double NPer, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 IPmt(float64 Rate, float64 Per, float64 NPer, float64 PV, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function IPmt (Rate As Double, Per As Double, NPer As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member IPmt : double * double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.VisualBasic.Financial.IPmt (Rate, Per, NPer, PV, FV, Due)

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每期利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Per
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定在 1 到 NPer 範圍內的付款期間。

span.span: specifying payment period in the range 1 through NPer.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定年金的總付款期數。

span.span: specifying total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值或今天的價值。

span.span: specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you've made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為那是它在最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that's its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的利息付款。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的利息付款。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示付款期計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也使用來計算月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 所有引數，若是現金支出 （例如存款） 會以負號;現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`IPmt`計算多少付款時所有付款相等值的函式。This example uses the `IPmt` function to calculate how much of a payment is interest when all the payments are of equal value. 指定為每個期間百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)、 付款期間的所需的感興趣的部分 (`Period`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，目前的值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，未來的貸款值 (`FVal`)，並指出是否為開頭或結尾付款期到期付款的數字 (`PayType`)。Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment period for which the interest portion is desired (`Period`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double IRR (ref double[] ValueArray, double Guess = 0.1);
.method public static float64 IRR(float64[]& ValueArray, float64 Guess) cil managed
Public Function IRR (ByRef ValueArray As Double(), Optional Guess As Double = 0.1) As Double
static member IRR : * double -> double

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定現金流量值的 陣列；

span.span: Array of specifying cash flow values.

param.span: 這個陣列至少必須含有一項負值 (付款) 和一項正值 (收款)。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

param.name: Guess
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 指定您預估值的物件將會由 所傳回。

span.span: Object specifying value you estimate will be returned by .

param.span: 如果省略，則 Guess 會是 0.1 (10%)。

span.span: If omitted, Guess is 0.1 (10 percent).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內部報酬率是接收付款和在定期間隔發生的回條組成的投資的利率。The internal rate of return is the interest rate received for an investment consisting of payments and receipts that occur at regular intervals. `IRR`函式會使用值陣列中的順序解譯收支的順序。The `IRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 請務必輸入您的付款和回條的值，以正確的順序。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. 現金流量，每個期間不需要固定，因為其適用於年金。The cash flow for each period does not need to be fixed, as it is for an annuity. `IRR` 計算方式為反覆項目。`IRR` is calculated by iteration. 開始值是`Guess`，`IRR`循環的計算，直到 0.00001%為止。Starting with the value of `Guess`, `IRR` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent. 如果`IRR`找不到 20 之後的結果會嘗試，它將會失敗。If `IRR` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails. ## Examples 在此範例中，`IRR`函式會傳回陣列中包含五個現金流量的一系列的內部報酬率`Values()`。In this example, the `IRR` function returns the internal rate of return for a series of five cash flows contained in the array `Values()`. 第一個陣列元素是負的現金流量，代表商務啟動成本。The first array element is a negative cash flow representing business start-up costs. 剩餘的四個現金流量代表正數現金流量接下來四年。The remaining four cash flows represent positive cash flows for the subsequent four years. `Guess` 是預估的內部報酬率。`Guess` is the estimated internal rate of return. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#20)]

span.span: Array argument values are invalid or <= -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double MIRR (ref double[] ValueArray, double FinanceRate, double ReinvestRate);
.method public static float64 MIRR(float64[]& ValueArray, float64 FinanceRate, float64 ReinvestRate) cil managed
Public Function MIRR (ByRef ValueArray As Double(), FinanceRate As Double, ReinvestRate As Double) As Double
public: static double MIRR(cli::array <double> ^ % ValueArray, double FinanceRate, double ReinvestRate);
static member MIRR : * double * double -> double

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定現金流量值的 陣列；

span.span: Array of specifying cash-flow values.

param.span: 這個陣列至少必須含有一項負值 (付款) 和一項正值 (收款)。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

param.name: FinanceRate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定當做融資成本支付的利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate paid as the cost of financing.

param.name: ReinvestRate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定從現金重新投資的收益所收到的利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate received on gains from cash reinvestment.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之修正的實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定一系列的定期現金流量 (付款及收到的款項) 之修正的實質報酬率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已修改的內部報酬率收支使用不同的速率時的內部報酬率。The modified internal rate of return is the internal rate of return when payments and receipts are financed at different rates. `MIRR`函式會考量投資成本 (`FinanceRate`) 和利率的現金計算 (`ReinvestRate`)。The `MIRR` function takes into account both the cost of the investment (`FinanceRate`) and the interest rate received on reinvestment of cash (`ReinvestRate`). `FinanceRate`和`ReinvestRatearguments`會表示為十進位值的百分比。The `FinanceRate` and `ReinvestRatearguments` are percentages expressed as decimal values. 例如，12%會表示為 0.12。For example, 12 percent is expressed as 0.12. `MIRR`函式會使用值陣列中的順序解譯收支的順序。The `MIRR` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 請務必輸入您的付款和回條的值，以正確的順序。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`MIRR`函數傳回的已修改內部報酬率的一系列的現金流量陣列中包含`Values()`。This example uses the `MIRR` function to return the modified internal rate of return for a series of cash flows contained in the array `Values()`. `LoanAPR` 代表融資感興趣，和`InvAPR`代表計算的利率。`LoanAPR` represents the financing interest, and `InvAPR` represents the interest rate received on reinvestment. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#29)]

span.span: Rank of does not equal 1, = -1, or = -1
Division by zero has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double NPer (double Rate, double Pmt, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 NPer(float64 Rate, float64 Pmt, float64 PV, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function NPer (Rate As Double, Pmt As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member NPer : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每期利率。

span.span: specifying interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifying payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that does not change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值或今天的價值。

span.span: specifying present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金期數。

span.span: Returns a specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金期數。

span.span: Returns a specifying the number of periods for an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). 所有引數，若是現金支出 （例如存款） 會以負號;現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`NPer`函數來傳回必須支付貸款其值進行付款期間的期數包含在`PVal`。This example uses the `NPer` function to return the number of periods during which payments must be made to pay off a loan whose value is contained in `PVal`. 也提供了一些每段期間的百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)，付款 (`Payment`)，貸款的未來值 (`FVal`)，並指出是否為開頭或結尾付款期到期付款的數字 (`PayType`).Also provided are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment (`Payment`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

span.span: = 0 and = 0

MemberSignature.Value: public static double NPV (double Rate, ref double[] ValueArray);
.method public static float64 NPV(float64 Rate, float64[]& ValueArray) cil managed
Public Function NPV (Rate As Double, ByRef ValueArray As Double()) As Double
public: static double NPV(double Rate, cli::array <double> ^ % ValueArray);
static member NPV : double * -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定某段期間的重貼現率，以十進位值表示。

span.span: specifying discount rate over the length of the period, expressed as a decimal.

param.name: ValueArray
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定現金流量值的 陣列；

span.span: Array of specifying cash flow values.

param.span: 這個陣列至少必須含有一項負值 (付款) 和一項正值 (收款)。

span.span: The array must contain at least one negative value (a payment) and one positive value (a receipt).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據一系列的定期現金流量 (付款和收款) 及重貼現率所得的投資淨現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據一系列的定期現金流量 (付款和收款) 及重貼現率所得的投資淨現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows (payments and receipts) and a discount rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 投資的淨現值是一連串的未來的付款和回條的目前值。The net present value of an investment is the current value of a future series of payments and receipts. `NPV`函式會使用值陣列中的順序解譯收支的順序。The `NPV` function uses the order of values within the array to interpret the order of payments and receipts. 請務必輸入您的付款和回條的值，以正確的順序。Be sure to enter your payment and receipt values in the correct sequence. `NPV`投資開始的第一個現金流量值的前一期，並結束陣列中的最後一個現金流量值。The `NPV` investment begins one period before the date of the first cash flow value and ends with the last cash flow value in the array. 淨現值計算根據未來的現金流量。The net present value calculation is based on future cash flows. 如果第一個的現金流量就會發生的第一個週期的開頭，必須加入的第一個值所傳回的值`NPV`，且不得包含的現金流量值`ValueArray`。If your first cash flow occurs at the beginning of the first period, the first value must be added to the value returned by `NPV` and must not be included in the cash flow values of `ValueArray`. `NPV`函數很相似`PV`函式 （存在的值），除了`PV`函式可讓現金流量開始於結尾或句點開頭。The `NPV` function is similar to the `PV` function (present value) except that the `PV` function allows cash flows to begin either at the end or the beginning of a period. 不同於變數`NPV`現金流量值`PV`現金流量必須固定在整個投資。Unlike the variable `NPV` cash flow values, `PV` cash flows must be fixed throughout the investment. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`NPV`函數傳回的一系列的現金流量陣列中包含淨現值`values()`。This example uses the `NPV` function to return the net present value for a series of cash flows contained in the array `values()`. 傳回值，儲存在`FixedRetRate`，代表固定的內部報酬率。The return value, stored in `FixedRetRate`, represents the fixed internal rate of return. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

span.span: is , rank of <> 1, or = -1

MemberSignature.Value: public static double Pmt (double Rate, double NPer, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);
.method public static float64 Pmt(float64 Rate, float64 NPer, float64 PV, float64 FV, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due) cil managed
Public Function Pmt (Rate As Double, NPer As Double, PV As Double, Optional FV As Double = 0, Optional Due As DueDate = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod) As Double
static member Pmt : double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每期利率。

span.span: specifies the interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 × 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 會指定未來要支付的一系列付款款項的現值 (或整筆金額)。

span.span: specifies the present value (or lump sum) that a series of payments to be paid in the future is worth now.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 during 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the payment for an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是時間的一系列固定的現金付款期間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made during a period of time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示付款期計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也使用來計算月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 所有的引數所負的數字，代表現金支出 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Pmt`函數來傳回在一段固定時間期間的貸款的每月付款。This example uses the `Pmt` function to return the monthly payment for a loan during a fixed period. 指定為每個期間百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，目前的值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，貸款的未來值 (`FVal`)，和數字，指出是否付款已到期的開頭或結尾付款期 `(PayType).`Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period `(PayType).` [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double PPmt (double Rate, double Per, double NPer, double PV, double FV = 0, Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate Due = Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate.EndOfPeriod);

static member PPmt : double * double * double * double * double * Microsoft.VisualBasic.DueDate -> double
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.VisualBasic.Financial.PPmt (Rate, Per, NPer, PV, FV, Due)

param.name: Rate
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每期利率。

span.span: specifies the interest rate per period.

param.span: 例如，如果您的汽車貸款年利率 (APR) 為 10% 並採月付方式償還，則每期的利率為 0.1/12，也就是 0.0083。

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

param.name: Per
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定在 1 到 NPer 範圍內的付款期間。

span.span: specifies the payment period in the range 1 through NPer.

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 x 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 x 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 必要項。 可指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值。

span.span: specifies the current value of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: ，指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifying future value or cash balance you want after you have made the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的本金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金在給定之期間內的本金付款款項。

span.span: Returns a specifying the principal payment for a given period of an annuity based on periodic fixed payments and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示付款期計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也使用來計算月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 所有的引數所負的數字，代表現金支出 （例如存款）現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`PPmt`計算所有付款都是相等的值時，在特定時段的付款多少是主體的函式。This example uses the `PPmt` function to calculate how much of a payment for a specific period is principal when all the payments are of equal value. 指定為每個期間百分比利率 (`APR / 12`)、 付款期間的所需的主要部分 (`Period`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，目前的值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，未來的貸款值 (`FVal`)，並指出是否為開頭或結尾付款期到期付款的數字 (`PayType`)。Given are the interest percentage rate per period (`APR / 12`), the payment period for which the principal portion is desired (`Period`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#24)]

span.span: For example, if you get a car loan at an annual percentage rate (APR) of 10 percent and make monthly payments, the rate per period is 0.1/12, or 0.0083.

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每一期所要付的款項。

param.span: 可指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 類型的物件，指定付款何時到期。

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 DueDate.EndOfPeriod。

span.span: If omitted, DueDate.EndOfPeriod is assumed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定根據未來要支付的定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定根據未來要支付的定期、定額款項及固定利率所計算的年金現值。

span.span: Returns a specifying the present value of an annuity based on periodic, fixed payments to be paid in the future and a fixed interest rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). `Rate`和`NPer`引數必須使用相同的單位表示付款期計算。The `Rate` and `NPer` arguments must be calculated using payment periods expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Rate`會使用幾個月，計算`NPer`必須也使用來計算月。For example, if `Rate` is calculated using months, `NPer` must also be calculated using months. 所有引數，若是現金支出 （例如存款） 會以負號;現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. ## Examples 在此範例中，`PV`函式會傳回提供年 20 年內 $50,000 的 $1,000,000 年金的現值。In this example, the `PV` function returns the present value of an $1,000,000 annuity that will provide $50,000 a year for the next 20 years. 提供的會預期年利率百分比 (`APR`)，付款的總數 (`TotPmts`)，每個付款數量 (`YrIncome`)，總計未來投資的價值 (`FVal`)，和數字，指出是否每個付款的開頭或結尾付款期 (`PayType`)。Provided are the expected annual percentage rate (`APR`), the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of each payment (`YrIncome`), the total future value of the investment (`FVal`), and a number that indicates whether each payment is made at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`). 請注意，`YrIncome`為負數，因為它代表現金支出從年金每一年。Note that `YrIncome` is a negative number because it represents cash paid out from the annuity each year. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

param.name: NPer
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 指定年金保險投資中付款的總期數。

span.span: specifies the total number of payment periods in the annuity.

param.span: 例如，如果您的四年期汽車貸款是採月付方式償還，則付款總期數就是 4 \* 12 (即 48) 期。

span.span: For example, if you make monthly payments on a four-year car loan, your loan has a total of 4 \* 12 (or 48) payment periods.

param.name: Pmt
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定每一期所要付的款項。

span.span: specifies the payment to be made each period.

param.span: 款項通常包含本金，以及不會隨著年金的有效期間而變更的利息。

span.span: Payments usually contain principal and interest that doesn't change over the life of the annuity.

param.name: PV
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 可指定一系列的未來付款或收到款項的現值或今天的價值。

span.span: specifies the present value, or value today, of a series of future payments or receipts.

param.span: 例如，當您貸款買車時，貸款金額就是您要以每月支付方式付給貸方的車款金額現值。

span.span: For example, when you borrow money to buy a car, the loan amount is the present value to the lender of the monthly car payments you will make.

param.name: FV
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 可指定您在最後一次付款之後想要的未來值或現金結存。

span.span: specifies the future value or cash balance you want after you make the final payment.

param.span: 例如，貸款的未來值為 $0，因為是代表最後一期付款之後的值。

span.span: For example, the future value of a loan is $0 because that is its value after the final payment.

param.span: 然而，如果您想在 18 年內存下美金 $50,000 元做為子女教育費用，那麼美金 $50,000 元就是未來值。

span.span: However, if you want to save $50,000 over 18 years for your child's education, then $50,000 is the future value.

param.span: 如果省略，則假設為 0。

span.span: If omitted, 0 is assumed.

param.name: Due
param.span: 選擇性。

span.span: Optional.

span.span: Object of type that specifies when payments are due.

param.span: 這個引數必須是 DueDate.EndOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的結束日)，或 DueDate.BegOfPeriod (若付款期限是付款期間的開始日)。

span.span: This argument must be either DueDate.EndOfPeriod if payments are due at the end of the payment period, or DueDate.BegOfPeriod if payments are due at the beginning of the period.

span.span: If omitted, Guess is 0.1 (10 percent).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定年金在每一期的利率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定年金在每一期的利率。

span.span: Returns a specifying the interest rate per period for an annuity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年金是一系列固定的現金付款經過一段時間。An annuity is a series of fixed cash payments made over a period of time. 年金可以貸款 （例如房屋貸款） 或 （例如每月節省計劃） 投資。An annuity can be a loan (such as a home mortgage) or an investment (such as a monthly savings plan). 所有引數，若是現金支出 （例如存款） 會以負號;現金收入 （例如被除數檢查） 會以正值的數字。For all arguments, cash paid out (such as deposits to savings) is represented by negative numbers; cash received (such as dividend checks) is represented by positive numbers. `Rate` 計算方式為反覆項目。`Rate` is calculated by iteration. 開始值是`Guess`，`Rate`循環的計算，直到 0.00001%為止。Starting with the value of `Guess`, `Rate` cycles through the calculation until the result is accurate to within 0.00001 percent. 如果`Rate`找不到 20 之後的結果會嘗試，它將會失敗。If `Rate` cannot find a result after 20 tries, it fails. 如果您的猜測是百分之 10 和`Rate`失敗，嘗試不同的值`Guess`。If your guess is 10 percent and `Rate` fails, try a different value for `Guess`. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rate`函數來計算指定的付款總數的貸款利率 (`TotPmts`)，loan 付款數量 (`Payment`)，目前的值或主體的貸款 (`PVal`)，未來值的貸款 (`FVal`)、 數字，指出是否為開頭或結尾付款期到期付款 (`PayType`)，和預期的利率的近似值 (`Guess`)。This example uses the `Rate` function to calculate the interest rate of a loan given the total number of payments (`TotPmts`), the amount of the loan payment (`Payment`), the present value or principal of the loan (`PVal`), the future value of the loan (`FVal`), a number that indicates whether the payment is due at the beginning or end of the payment period (`PayType`), and an approximation of the expected interest rate (`Guess`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

Public Function SLN (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double) As Double
public: static double SLN(double Cost, double Salvage, double Life);
static member SLN : double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的初始成本。

span.span: specifying initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產在可用期末的價值。

span.span: specifying value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的可用期間長度。

span.span: specifying length of the useful life of the asset.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在單一期間內的直線折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在單一期間內的直線折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須為相同的單位表示折舊期間`Life`引數。The depreciation period must be expressed in the same unit as the `Life` argument. 所有引數必須是正數。All arguments must be positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`SLN`函數來傳回指定資產的最初成本單期資產的直線折舊 (`InitCost`)，結尾的資產使用年限的殘值 (`SalvageVal`)，和總計的存留期年中的資產 (`LifeTime`)。This example uses the `SLN` function to return the straight-line depreciation of an asset for a single period given the asset's initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), and the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

Public Function SYD (Cost As Double, Salvage As Double, Life As Double, Period As Double) As Double
public: static double SYD(double Cost, double Salvage, double Life, double Period);
static member SYD : double * double * double * double -> double

param.name: Cost
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的初始成本。

span.span: specifying the initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Salvage
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產在可用期末的價值。

span.span: specifying the value of the asset at the end of its useful life.

param.name: Life
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定資產的可用期間長度。

span.span: specifying the length of the useful life of the asset.

param.name: Period
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: ，指定計算資產折舊所用的期間。

span.span: specifying the period for which asset depreciation is calculated.

summary.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在指定之期間內的年數總和法折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.

returns.span: 傳回 ，指定資產在指定之期間內的年數總和法折舊。

span.span: Returns a specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Life`和`Period`引數必須以相同的單位表示。The `Life` and `Period` arguments must be expressed in the same units. 例如，如果`Life`指定月數`Period`也必須指定以月為單位。For example, if `Life` is given in months, `Period` must also be given in months. 所有引數必須是正數。All arguments must be positive numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`SYD`函數來傳回計算資產折舊資產的最初成本在指定期間內 (`InitCost`)，結尾的資產使用年限的殘值 (`SalvageVal`)，和總計的生命週期中的資產年 (`LifeTime`)。This example uses the `SYD` function to return the depreciation of an asset for a specified period given the asset's initial cost (`InitCost`), the salvage value at the end of the asset's useful life (`SalvageVal`), and the total life of the asset in years (`LifeTime`). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
